summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PAM concert discovery app iteration 4 focusing on MusicBrainz API integration and Spotify API deprecation fixes. Backend APIs working perfectly (13/13 tests passed including new MusicBrainz connectivity test). Frontend core functionality working correctly with proper purple branding throughout most of the app. All navigation flows operational from landing page through onboarding to dashboard.

design_issues.issue: All 'Connect Spotify' and 'Get Started' buttons use green color instead of expected purple (#380E75) theme
affected_locations: Onboarding final step Connect Spotify button
design_issues.impact: Brand consistency - buttons should match the #380E75/#DED5EB purple/lavender color scheme

passed_tests: GET /api/ health check returns 'PAM API is running'
POST /api/users creates user successfully with UUID
GET /api/users/{user_id} retrieves user data correctly
PUT /api/users/{user_id} updates user fields (concerts_per_month, ticket_budget, city)
GET /api/spotify/login returns valid Spotify OAuth URL with correct client_id and state parameter
POST /api/favorites creates and returns favorite concert with proper concert object structure
GET /api/favorites/{user_id} returns user favorites list as array
DELETE /api/favorites/{favorite_id} removes favorite successfully and returns {deleted: true}
POST /api/share/create correctly rejects when no taste profile exists (400)
GET /api/share/{invalid_id} returns 404 for nonexistent shares with proper error message
MusicBrainz API connectivity test successful - can query artists (e.g. Radiohead)
Error handling for invalid user creation (422) and nonexistent users (404)
Landing page renders with correct PAM branding and purple (#380E75) logo
Landing page displays hero section 'Find your next favorite show' correctly
Landing page shows 3 feature cards: Taste Fingerprint, Local Discovery, Smart Matching
Landing page Get Started button navigates to /onboarding successfully
Onboarding step 1 form validation (name/email inputs) working correctly
Onboarding step 1 purple progress bar and Continue button styling
Onboarding step 2 displays concert preferences with functional sliders
Onboarding step 2 sliders show current values (concerts per month, budget per show)
Onboarding final step shows Connect Spotify button with proper navigation
Dashboard loads correctly with user greeting and navigation elements
Dashboard shows appropriate 'Connect Spotify to build taste fingerprint' state
Dashboard logout button present and functional
Dashboard Taste Fingerprint section displays correctly
Share page error state (/share/invalid-id) displays correct error message
Share page error state has working purple 'Discover Your Taste' button
Purple color scheme (#380E75) confirmed in PAM logo and main branding elements
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix color scheme consistency: Change all green 'Get Started' and 'Connect Spotify' buttons to use the purple (#380E75) color scheme to maintain brand consistency throughout the app. All other purple branding elements are correctly implemented.

success_percentage.backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed - all endpoints working perfectly, MusicBrainz integration confirmed)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core functionality working, minor color scheme inconsistency on Spotify buttons)
